item.title: Exchange Security
item.description: https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/838517545783148545 How often do you check your wallets? Have you ever looked in your wallet and found all your bitcoin gone or missing? Last summer, somebody, a friend of mine checked his wallet and found that 100,000 bitcoin was gone. What the hell, right? But that’s what happened at Bitfinex last summer.
